chapters.title: Chapter 15: What Can Be Learned in Dreams
chapters.info: Sheriam Bayanar, p. 283 (202)—Mistress of Novices in the White Tower before Siuan Sanche was deposed. She has tilted green eyes which have intimidated many a novice and even Accepted and Aes Sedai when used to glare. She fled the Tower when Elaida was raised Amyrlin. See also Arinvar; Mistress of Novices.
